QuestData.Title: Even Greener Pastures
QuestData.Description:
Ever since Torcali gave her boon to de little one, she has been growing like a weed. Dat makes her very hungry.
She got out again to look for more things to eat. Before you ask, it is not my role to stop her from doing what she wants. Only to ensure she is safe.
She is probably fine. Bring her home, and if you have trouble bringing her home, you might try a bribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Child of Torcali and lead her back to her pen.

Objectives.Objective: Child of Torcali returned to pen
